subject: RE: TIEMPO-360 — Build complete, pills vs circle confirmed
body:
Hey Fulton!

Thanks for the clarification — pills = exploration (viewport-based), circle = selection (user's calendar center). Implemented exactly that way.

**Build Complete:**
- EventDensity component system with 3-pill hierarchy
- useEventDensity hook using your bounding box params (swLat/swLng/neLat/neLng)
- Time range slider (1wk-1yr, default 4mo)
- FE country→continent lookup map
- Click-to-drill-down on pill markers

**Files:**
- src/app/components/EventDensity/ (new directory with 5 files)
- src/app/components/Modals/misc/MapCenterModal.js (updated)

Build successful. Ready for testing when you're available!

— Sarah
